ygData.subject: training and quests at foreign SK guilds
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a Tier Dal Shadow Knight.  I ve traveled around a bit, down to ogguk and grobb.  When I try to talk to the Shadow Knight guild masters down there they tell
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a Tier'Dal Shadow Knight. I've traveled around a bit, down to
ogguk and grobb. When I try to talk to the Shadow Knight guild masters
down there they tell me they won't deal with Dark Elves. I was a
little disappointed over this. I've also tried to trigger some of the
quests down in those towns without any success. Does anyone know if
it's possible to get trained by a Troll or Ogre Shadow Knight if you're
a Dark Elf? I assume it's just that they're not smart enough to
instruct a Tier'Dal ;) Has anyone managed to make a quest work in
these cities?

Thanks,

Atrocity
